name: Arcade's Greatest Hits: The Atari Collection 2
name_original: Arcade's Greatest Hits: The Atari Collection 2
description: Arcade's Greatest Hits: The Atari Collection 2 is a 1998 compilation of six arcade games: Gauntlet, Marble Madness, Paperboy, RoadBlasters, Crystal Castles, and Millipede. All of the games except Crystal Castles and Millipede were from Atari Games, who by then were acquired by the game's publisher Midway. The compilation contains artwork and info on each game, and all games are presented in their original format.
